attributes.action: Warn children about the effects of knife crime in schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want people in the uk to get a better understanding of how knife crime effects people. i think this should be aimed at secondary school children as it is mostly people in this age group that tend to carry knifes with them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
